name: Hungry Baby Dessert Blitz
description:
The Hungry Baby Dessert Blitz game is a fun, addicting game that will keep you entertained for a long time! Some babies just have a sweet tooth, and this one's never satisfied - he always wants more! Flick the yummy treats into his mouth to keep him happy. Nobody wants an angry, crying baby on their hands!

Features:
* Great for all ages
* Amazing graphics
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Addictive Gaming

Download right now!
